feed.title: Wishlist Releases

entry.title: New release for Wishlist: v0.38.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/cmintey/wishlist/pull/212
  • add missing translations by @cmintey in https://github.com/cmintey/wishlist/pull/216

Full Changelog: https://github.com/cmintey/wishlist/compare/v0.38.0...v0.38.1

entry.title: New release for Wishlist: v0.38.2

Full Changelog: https://github.com/cmintey/wishlist/compare/v0.38.1...v0.38.2

entry.title: New release for Wishlist: v0.39.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Allow inviting users via links when smtp enabled by @cmintey in https://github.com/cmintey/wishlist/pull/229
  • Fix password reset form by @cmintey in https://github.com/cmintey/wishlist/pull/232
  • Add basic bookmarklet support by @cmintey in https://github.com/cmintey/wishlist/pull/230

Full Changelog: https://github.com/cmintey/wishlist/compare/v0.38.3...v0.39.0
